SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Bg_Product WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( product_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )

SELECT id AS productId, product_name AS productName, content, price, origin_name AS originName, image_url AS imageUrl FROM Bg_Product WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( product_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
ORDER BY
price
created_at
ASC
DESC
LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT p.id as productId, p.product_name as productName, p.price as price, p.image_url as imageUrl, /* 해당 상품이 주문된 총 수량을 합산 */ IFNULL(SUM(oi.amount), 0) as salesCount FROM Bg_Product p LEFT JOIN Bg_Order_item oi ON p.id = oi.product_id GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY salesCount DESC LIMIT 4
